extension.summary: [COLOR aquamarine][B]ONE[/COLOR][COLOR white]PLAY[/B][/COLOR] - [B]It is a free video plugin for KODI that aggregates video playback links of various types. Bringing pleasure and pleasure for you to watch and enjoy every moment with family and friends.

[COLOR aquamarine][B]ONE[/COLOR][COLOR white]PLAY[/B][/COLOR] - [B]É um plugin de vídeo gratuito para o KODI que agrega links de reprodução de vídeos de vários tipos. Levando o lazer e o prazer para vocês assistir e curtir cada momento com a família e amigos.
extension.description: [COLOR aquamarine][B]ONE[/COLOR][COLOR white]PLAY[/B][/COLOR] - Watch TV, movies and tvshows.
[COLOR aquamarine][B]ONE[/COLOR][COLOR white]PLAY[/B][/COLOR] - Assista Tv, filmes e series.
extension.disclaimer: The author is in no way affiliated with the Kodi, Team Kodi or the XBMC Foundation. This is a non-profit resource organized solely for educational purposes and protected by the fair use doctrine of the Copyright Act, specifically section 107, which promotes freedom of expression by allowing unlicensed use of copyrighted works.

O autor nao e de forma alguma afiliado ao Kodi, Team Kodi ou a XBMC Foundation. Este e um recurso sem fins lucrativos, organizado exclusivamente para fins educacionais e protegido pela doutrina de uso justo da Lei de Direitos Autorais, especificamente a secao 107, que promove a liberdade de expressao, permitindo o uso nao licenciado de obras protegidas por direitos autorais.

extension.description: Play Cine oferece as melhores séries e filmes e conta com Tv Ao vivo para você no seu kodi.
extension.disclaimer: PlayCine não hospeda os conteudos, todos os filmes e series são links agregados ao addon.
extension.news: v1.0.5.matrix - Inauguração do PlayCine em Python 3 v1.0.6.matrix.1 - Adicionado Tv Ao vivo v1.0.7.matrix - Correção da codificação

extension.summary: Watch Red Bull TV, live and on demand.
extension.description: Red Bull TV gives you front-row access to live events, the best inaction sports, new music and entertainment, and thrilling videos from world adventurers.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not endorsed by Red Bull GmbH and is provided 'as is' without any warranty of any kind.
extension.summary: Bekijk Red Bull TV, live en op aanvraag.
extension.description: Red Bull TV geeft je toegang vanop de eerste rij voor live evenementen, de beste actie sporten, muziek en entertainment, en spannende videos van avonturiers.
extension.disclaimer: Deze add-on wordt niet herkend door Red Bull GmbH en wordt zonder enige garantie van welke aard dan ook aangeboden.
extension.news:
v3.2.1 - Fix OK dialog - Catch missing EPG time markers
v3.2.0 - Support VOD playback from EPG via context menu - Add YouTube integration (requires YouTube add-on) - Improve channel listing - New add-on icon
v3.1.0 - IPTV Manager support
v3.0.0 - Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger

extension.description:
The Regio TV add-on lists all available Flemish regional television stations.
Available channels: ATV, BRUZZ, Focus TV, ROB-tv, TVL, TV Oost, WTV
[I]This add-on is not endorsed by any television station, and is provided 'as is' without any warranty of any kind.[/I]
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not endorsed by any television station, and is provided 'as is' without any warranty of any kind.
extension.description:
De Regio TV add-on geeft een overzicht van alle Vlaamse regionale televisiezenders.
Beschikbare zenders: ATV, BRUZZ, Focus TV, ROB-tv, TVL, TV Oost, WTV
[I]Deze add-on wordt niet ondersteund door een televisiezender, en wordt aangeboden 'as is', zonder enige garantie.[/I]
extension.disclaimer: Deze add-on wordt niet ondersteund door een televisiezender, en wordt aangeboden 'as is', zonder enige garantie.
extension.news:
v0.1.2 (2020-08-01) - Add support for IPTV Manager - Add support for referer - Add RegioTV artwork
v0.1.1 (2020-02-11) - Fix regional channels BRUZZ, Focus TV and WTV
v0.1.0 (2019-11-08) - Initial public release
